News.headline: National League News: One Minute Silence
News.page_title: National League News: One Minute Silence
News.URL_keywords: National League News: One Minute Silence
News.short_description: All National League Clubs will hold a minute silence prior to the commencement of this Saturday's games
News.description:
Before Saturday's kick off Dagenham & Redbridge FC and York City FC, players, supporters and staff will be holding a minutes silence remembering not only those who lost their lives but extending our thoughts and a speedy recovery to those injured in this week's tragic events in London.

We are sure that everyone involved would also like to extend their sympathies to the families and friends of those involved.

Our thoughts are with everyone affected.
